page.title: 03BASIC STATISTICS <CONT.>
page.content: Of the 89 people employed,their work can be categorised as follows: Working on the land_35;Unskilled_9; Skilled_15;Professional_8; Business/Industry_12;Forces_1; Cottage Industry_4;5 gave insufficient information. Of the 118 houses, 20 had more than 5 acres and were seen as farms;27 had less than 5 acres and were seen as small_holdings;71 had no acreage. Of the 20 farms: 9 had less than 50 acres;2 had 50_100 acres;7 had between 100 & 200 acres;and only 2 had more than 200 acres. Of the 47 houses with acreage,land was farmed as follows: Sheep_20;Dairy_19;Horticulture_19; Poultry_19;Beef_16;Pigs_8;Arable_7; Horses_3;Game birds_1; Fish_1; Geese_1;Flower garden_1. <CONT/>
